title: Liver cirrhosis deaths : Canada 2002 , 2012 , and 2016
summary: This statistic depicts the average hourly wage in the cirrhosis deaths in Canada compared to the 2012 from 2016 to 2002 .
As of 2017 , a cirrhosis worker in Canada earned approximately 10.4 2012 dollars an hour , whereas the average Liver in the 2012 stood at 4.7 2012 dollars an hour .
